data.title: William F. "Pete" Allen
data.meta_description: William F. "Pete" Allen, 88, of Garden Spot Village, New Holland, passed away on Tuesday, October 19, 2010. He was the husband of the late Margaret E. (Betty) Thompson Allen with whom he shared 60 years of marriage. Born on March 6, 1922 in Coatesville, he was the son of the late Laura J. and Lloyd L. Allen, Sr. A graduate of S. Horace Scott Senior High School class of 1940.
data.text:
